definitions.definition: a hope or ambition of achieving something.
examples: he had nothing tangible to back up his literary aspirations
synonyms: target "his greatest aspiration is to win an Olympic gold medal"

definitions.definition: the object of one's hope or ambition; a goal.
examples: fabrics and oriental rugs were my aspirations

definitions.definition: the action or process of drawing breath.
the action of drawing fluid by suction from a vessel or cavity.
the action of pronouncing a sound with an exhalation of breath.
